data.title: List of works by Jean
data.text:
This list is manually maintained, therefore some of the available pieces may not yet be linked from this page. For an automatically generated alphabetical list of all available pieces, please see

Category:Rameau, Jean-Philippe.

A list of works in the composer category that are not included here can be found .

Please consult the manual of style for creating composer work lists.

"RCT" numbering refers to Rameau Catalogue Thématique established by Sylvie Bouissou and Denis Herlin (CNRS Édition et Éditions de la BnF, Paris 2007).

Contents

1 Instrumental Works

2 Motets

3 Canons

4 Songs

5 Cantatas

6 Operas & Stage Works

Instrumental Works

Premier Livre de Pièces de Clavecin (1706) :

RCT 1: Suite in A minor

Pièces de Clavecin avec une méthode (1724) :

RCT 2: Suite in E minor

RCT 3: Suite in D major

RCT 4: Menuet in C major

Nouvelles suites de pièces de clavecin (1726/27) :

RCT 5: Suite in A minor

RCT 6: Suite in G minor

Pièces de Clavecin en Concerts (1726/27) :

RCT 7: Concert I in C minor

RCT 8: Concert II in G major

RCT 9: Concert III in A major

RCT 10: Concert IV in B♭ major

RCT 11: Concert V in D minor

Miscellaneous Pièces de Clavecin :

RCT 12: La Dauphine (1747)

RCT 12bis: Les petits marteaux

Motets

RCT 13: Deus Noster Refugium (c. 1713-1715)

RCT 14: In Convertendo (probably before 1720, rev. 1751)

RCT 15: Quam Dilecta (c. 1713–1715)

RCT 16: Laboravi (published in Traité de l'Harmonie, 1722)

Canons

RCT 17: Ah! loin de rire, pleurons (SATB) (pub. 1722)

RCT 18: Avec du vin, endormons-nous (SST) (1719)

RCT 18bis: L'épouse entre deux draps (SSS) (formerly attributed to François Couperin)

RCT 18ter: Je suis un fou Madame (3 voix égales) (1720)

RCT 19: Mes chers amis, quittez vos rouges bords (SSSBBB) (pub. 1780)

RCT 20: Réveillez-vous, dormeur sans fin (5 voix égales) (pub. 1722)

RCT 20bis: Si tu ne prends garde à toi (SSB) (1720)

Songs

RCT 21.1: L'Amante préoccupée (ou A l'objet que j'adore) (soprano, continuo) (1763)

RCT 21.2: Lucas, pour se gausser de nous (soprano, bass, continuo) (pub. 1707)

RCT 21.3: Non, non, le dieu qui sait aimer (soprano, continuo) (1763)

RCT 21.4: Un Bourbon ouvre sa carrière (ou Un Héros ouvre sa carrière) (alto, continuo) (1751, air belonging to Acante et Céphise but censored before its first performance and never reintroduced in the work).

Cantatas

RCT 22: Les Amants trahis (around 1720)

RCT 23: Aquilon et Orithie (between 1715 and 1720)

RCT 24: Le berger fidèle (1728)

RCT 25: Cantate pour le jour de la Saint Louis (1740)

RCT 26: L’impatience (between 1715 and 1720)

RCT 27: Orphée (around 1720)

RCT 28: Thétis (between 1715 and 1720)

Operas & Stage Works
